choices.answer: Predictions
Expresse a complete action before something in the past
When we talk about intentions and plans

questions.question: Choose the correct form of Past Perfect:

choices.answer: Subject+had+verb past participle
subject+have+verb with ing
subject+have/has+verb past participle
subject+was/were+verb past participle

questions.question: Which sentence is not Past Perfect:

choices.answer: I didnt have any money because i had lost my wallet
She never saw a bear before she moved to Alaska
She only understood the movie because she had read the book
You had studied English before you moved to New York

questions.question: Which sentence is in Past Perfect:

choices.answer: I had eaten breakfast before I arrived at school today
I was talking to my uncle when he scored
He have been to the gym twice this week
The girl was in the hospital because she had broken her leg

questions.question: Which sentence is not Past Perfect:

choices.answer: Rachel hadnt lost hope, and in the  end she found her baby

I had met him before you introduced us

questions.question: Which sentence is in Past Perfect and Pat Simple:

choices.answer: We decided to get married
I have always liked running
I haven´t been out much this week

questions.question: Choose the sentence that happened in a specific time in the past:

choices.answer: Molly had wanted a guitar, but she received a book

choices.answer: You said you had bought this dress in the mall.
